description: MCP Server Configuration for Software Engineers - Optimized Bundle

serena.description: LSP-based semantic code navigation (100x better than text search)
use_cases: Find all implementations of an interface
Go to definition across complex dependency injection
serena.why_essential: Only MCP server using Language Server Protocol. Understands code structure, not just text.

github.description: GitHub integration for PRs, issues, and code reviews
use_cases: Create pull requests with AI-generated descriptions
github.why_essential: Core to modern development workflow - PRs, issues, CI/CD

filesystem.description: Fast file operations with large file handling
use_cases: Read and write source code files
filesystem.why_essential: Fundamental file I/O for all development tasks

memory.why_recommended: Dramatically improves context retention for complex projects

use_cases: Generate test scripts from user flows
playwright.why_recommended: Full-stack engineers need E2E testing capabilities

postgres.why_recommended: Most backend engineers work with PostgreSQL daily
postgres.security_note: Use read-only database user for safety

configuration_tips.java_spring_projects: Serena excels at Spring Boot with dependency injection - understands @Autowired, @Component, etc.
configuration_tips.large_monorepos: Use Serena for symbol navigation, Filesystem for file operations
configuration_tips.microservices: Configure Serena per service, use GitHub for cross-repo coordination
configuration_tips.database_work: PostgreSQL server enables schema inspection and query testing without leaving Claude
configuration_tips.e2e_testing: Playwright generates tests from natural language descriptions of user flows

feature_development: 1. Use Serena to understand existing code structure
2. Use Sequential-thinking to plan implementation phases
4. Use Playwright to create E2E tests
debugging: 1. Use Serena to find all usages of problematic code
2. Use Memory to recall similar issues
3. Use PostgreSQL to verify database state
code_review: 2. Use Serena to understand changed code context
3. Use Sequential-thinking to evaluate architectural impact
4. Use GitHub to post review comments

optimization_tips: Serena is expensive (LSP startup) - keep it running between sessions
Use Memory to cache architectural decisions and reduce re-explanation
PostgreSQL server should use read-only user for security
Playwright tests can be expensive - generate focused tests, not full suites
